$interpreted: Himawari: J-Juan-Yun can be saved, right? Tell me you can still save him!
Qing-Feng: A corpse is a corpse, there's nothing left to save.
Himawari: No!!! Juan-Yun!!
Maeok: How could you do something so stupid, Yonghyeon?
Yonghyeon: B-Because...
Qing-Feng: He's dead, what's the point of asking now?
Qing-Feng: At least Tindoiimu is fine. Otherwise, we'd have a problem.
Qing-Feng: That said, Yonghyeon did kill my son, and he is one of yours. So, how would you like to deal with him?
Maeok: Ah...
Maeok: I will let our judicial system decide.
Qing-Feng: Murder is no small crime. We'll have to call together a trial at the Alliance Hall.
Qing-Feng: Unless you mean to play favorites?
Maeok: That's not what I meant. I just mean, this whole thing...
Qing-Feng: Forget it, with the ceremony coming up I dare say we don't need any more drama. I'll let you handle it, Maeok.
Maeok: Let me handle it!? How would that be fair to you and your son!?
Qing-Feng: What's unfair is that my son has been killed. Right now I'm just trying to think big picture.
Qing-Feng: So, if there's nothing else, I've got to go train the guards for tomorrow.
Maeok: B-But...
Qing-Feng: All my son wanted, before he died, was to see Tindoiimu become arbiter. At least give me the honor of fulfilling his last wish.
Qing-Feng: Or should we ask someone else to handle Yonghyeon?
Maeok: ......
Maeok: ...Okay, I'll handle it.
Qing-Feng: Well then, I'll leave you to it.
Himawari: Qing-Feng, tomorrow I...
Qing-Feng: Juan-Yun cared about you deeply, Himawari. Stay and mourn your loss, don't worry about tomorrow.
Himawari: T-Thank you...
Yonghyeon: Arbiter... I'm sorry, it's all my fault...
Maeok: Just don't say anything. I know that whatever you did, you did for Soohyeon.
Maeok: But you're too impetuous. If you keep this up, you'll get her in trouble.
Yonghyeon: Don't worry, Arbiter. I take responsibility. If you need me to pay with my life, I will!
Maeok: Is that so...
Maeok: Listen, Yonghyeon, you've been with our family for so many years. Is there anything you wish to say for yourself?
Yonghyeon: I... I know I've done wrong, and you don't have to go easy on me, but... If I could just ask you to not bring Soohyeon into this...
Maeok: Hmph!
Yonghyeon: Arbiter...?
Maeok: I can see that you're serious... your death would be pointless now. I think you could still help Soohyeon, although it might be asking a lot from you.
Yonghyeon: If I can help Soohyeon in any way, I'll do whatever it takes!
Maeok: ...Very well. Come with me.
Soohyeon: Yonghyeon!? Mom!?
Maeok: Quiet.
Maeok: Yonghyeon, I want you to take Soohyeon, leave the East Alliance and never come back.
Soohyeon: Mom, what are you talking about!?
Yonghyeon: A-Are you... exiling us!?
Maeok: Listen, starting tomorrow I won't be the arbiter anymore, and then I won't be able to protect you.
Maeok: Now, make haste. I've paid the guards to look the other way.
???: Is that so?
Maeok: Ace!? What are you doing here?
Ace: Doing my job.
Yonghyeon: Get out of here, human! You aren't welcome here!
Ace: Get out of my way, kid.
Yonghyeon: You get out of the way!!
Maeok: Stop, Yonghyeon! He's here for me.
Yonghyeon: Arbiter Maeok?
Ace: Seems like you've been privy to my arrival. Send any more exploding letters, lately?
Soohyeon: Exploding letters? W-What!? My mom didn't have anything to do with that!
Ace: I didn't believe it at first, either. Why would the arbiter do such a thing?
Ace: But then I found records written by a certain artisan.
Ace: He's long gone by now, but we've still been able to dig up that he and the arbiter had some sort of relationship.
Ace: That's why he agreed to custom make those fireworks for you, as well as...
Ace: Exploding letters for the Desert Kingdom and my own! Says it all right here in his records!
Maeok: ...So, I've been found out...
Soohyeon: Mom!? But... why!?
Maeok: ...It was all to keep you from ever joining that damned tournament.
Soohyeon: Me!?
Maeok: Soohyeon... I've known about you being a bewitcher for a long time now.
Maeok: How could I not know? I'm your mother.
Soohyeon: ...B-But, why didn't you tell me? Didn't it scare you... having a daughter like me...
Maeok: Don't be silly, Soohyeon. A mother is never scared of her own daughter.
Maeok: I couldn't tell you I knew, it would be too dangerous. I'm the arbiter, after all.
Soohyeon: Mom...
Maeok: I couldn't say anything out loud, and I couldn't watch you join the tournament... it would be much too dangerous.
Maeok: So, I had to find some reason to stop the tournament, or stop you from joining.
Ace: And so you chose to endanger the lives of royalty?
Maeok: It may seem extreme, but it was the only way I could think to get you two involved.
Ace: You used us, plain and simple, as a way to make decisions you wouldn't normally be able to make.
Soohyeon: ...So, you planned all of this all along, Mom?
Maeok: Well, I never could have planned for the Udumbara flowering, or for you to reveal your identity to help Pearl Manor.
Soohyeon: Mom... you did all of this for me...
Soohyeon: I've been worrying about you all this time... and I've even been angry with you...
Maeok: Don't cry, my child. You were just trying to help me in your own way, and all those people in need.
Maeok: You had... no choice.
Soohyeon: Mom... I'm sorry!
Yonghyeon: (...The arbiter's done so much for Soohyeon, and here I am acting like a fool...)
Ace: I understand you were just acting on behalf of your child, Arbiter Maeok, and yet your actions have their consequences.
Maeok: I know you have to do your job as an ambassador to your kingdom, and yet...
Maeok: If your sister were in danger, I assume her safety would take precedence, would it not?
Ace: You better explain yourself right now.
Maeok: According to my intel, someone named Sione has been trapped by my army in Pearl Manor. I'm not sure how long she'll be able to last...
Ace: Dammit...!!!
Ace: You better pray my sister isn't hurt!
Ace: Everyone, come with me. We're going to Pearl Manor!
Maeok: They're finally gone. Quick, you two, leave while you still can!
Soohyeon: But mom, what about you?
Maeok: I must attend the ceremony and keep up appearances. That will give you ample time to escape.
Soohyeon: No! I'm not leaving without you!
Maeok: Soohyeon... What's most important right now is that you're safe.
Soohyeon: But, mom...
Maeok: Please, just do this for me. I promise I'll come find you after all of this is over.
Soohyeon: ...O-Okay, mom... I understand...
Maeok: Yonghyeon...
Yonghyeon: I won't let any harm come to Soohyeon!
Maeok: Good. Now go.
Soohyeon: You better keep your promise, mom! You better come see me soon!
Maeok: Silly girl... when have I ever broken a promise to you?

Model.Text: J-Juan-Yun can be saved, right? Tell me you can still save him!
A corpse is a corpse, there's nothing left to save.
No!!! Juan-Yun!!
How could you do something so stupid, Yonghyeon?
B-Because...
He's dead, what's the point of asking now?
At least Tindoiimu is fine. Otherwise, we'd have a problem.
That said, Yonghyeon did kill my son, and he is one of yours. So, how would you like to deal with him?
Ah...
I will let our judicial system decide.

Or should we ask someone else to handle Yonghyeon?
...Okay, I'll handle it.
Well then, I'll leave you to it.

Juan-Yun cared about you deeply, Himawari. Stay and mourn your loss, don't worry about tomorrow.
T-Thank you...
Arbiter... I'm sorry, it's all my fault...
Just don't say anything. I know that whatever you did, you did for Soohyeon.
But you're too impetuous. If you keep this up, you'll get her in trouble.
Don't worry, Arbiter. I take responsibility. If you need me to pay with my life, I will!
Is that so...
Listen, Yonghyeon, you've been with our family for so many years. Is there anything you wish to say for yourself?
I... I know I've done wrong, and you don't have to go easy on me, but... If I could just ask you to not bring Soohyeon into this...
Hmph!
Arbiter...?
I can see that you're serious... your death would be pointless now. I think you could still help Soohyeon, although it might be asking a lot from you.
If I can help Soohyeon in any way, I'll do whatever it takes!
...Very well. Come with me.
Yonghyeon!? Mom!?
Quiet.
Yonghyeon, I want you to take Soohyeon, leave the East Alliance and never come back.
Mom, what are you talking about!?
A-Are you... exiling us!?
Listen, starting tomorrow I won't be the arbiter anymore, and then I won't be able to protect you.
Now, make haste. I've paid the guards to look the other way.
Is that so?
Ace!? What are you doing here?
Doing my job.
Get out of here, human! You aren't welcome here!
Get out of my way, kid.
You get out of the way!!
Stop, Yonghyeon! He's here for me.
Arbiter Maeok?
Seems like you've been privy to my arrival. Send any more exploding letters, lately?
Exploding letters? W-What!? My mom didn't have anything to do with that!
I didn't believe it at first, either. Why would the arbiter do such a thing?
But then I found records written by a certain artisan.
He's long gone by now, but we've still been able to dig up that he and the arbiter had some sort of relationship.
That's why he agreed to custom make those fireworks for you, as well as...
Exploding letters for the Desert Kingdom and my own! Says it all right here in his records!
...So, I've been found out...
Mom!? But... why!?
...It was all to keep you from ever joining that damned tournament.
Me!?
Soohyeon... I've known about you being a bewitcher for a long time now.
How could I not know? I'm your mother.
...B-But, why didn't you tell me? Didn't it scare you... having a daughter like me...
Don't be silly, Soohyeon. A mother is never scared of her own daughter.
I couldn't tell you I knew, it would be too dangerous. I'm the arbiter, after all.
Mom...
I couldn't say anything out loud, and I couldn't watch you join the tournament... it would be much too dangerous.
So, I had to find some reason to stop the tournament, or stop you from joining.
And so you chose to endanger the lives of royalty?
It may seem extreme, but it was the only way I could think to get you two involved.
You used us, plain and simple, as a way to make decisions you wouldn't normally be able to make.
...So, you planned all of this all along, Mom?
Well, I never could have planned for the Udumbara flowering, or for you to reveal your identity to help Pearl Manor.
Mom... you did all of this for me...
I've been worrying about you all this time... and I've even been angry with you...
Don't cry, my child. You were just trying to help me in your own way, and all those people in need.
You had... no choice.
Mom... I'm sorry!
(...The arbiter's done so much for Soohyeon, and here I am acting like a fool...)
I understand you were just acting on behalf of your child, Arbiter Maeok, and yet your actions have their consequences.
I know you have to do your job as an ambassador to your kingdom, and yet...
If your sister were in danger, I assume her safety would take precedence, would it not?
You better explain yourself right now.
According to my intel, someone named Sione has been trapped by my army in Pearl Manor. I'm not sure how long she'll be able to last...
Dammit...!!!
You better pray my sister isn't hurt!
Everyone, come with me. We're going to Pearl Manor!
They're finally gone. Quick, you two, leave while you still can!
But mom, what about you?
I must attend the ceremony and keep up appearances. That will give you ample time to escape.
No! I'm not leaving without you!
Soohyeon... What's most important right now is that you're safe.
But, mom...
Please, just do this for me. I promise I'll come find you after all of this is over.

Yonghyeon...
I won't let any harm come to Soohyeon!
Good. Now go.
You better keep your promise, mom! You better come see me soon!
Silly girl... when have I ever broken a promise to you?

Mom!?","sfxName":"","sfxVolume":1.0},{"ID":"main_314_001_dialog_english##_15_001","SpeakerName":"Maeok","SpeakerAssetName":"CharacterName/t3407c4","IconName":"t3407c4_serious","IconLocate":2,"Text":"Quiet.","sfxName":"","sfxVolume":1.0},{"ID":"main_314_001_dialog_english##_16_000","SpeakerName":"Maeok","SpeakerAssetName":"CharacterName/t3407c4","IconName":"t3407c4_serious","IconLocate":2,"Text":"Yonghyeon, I want you to take Soohyeon, leave the East Alliance and never come back.","sfxName":"","sfxVolume":1.0},{"ID":"main_314_001_dialog_english##_17_000","SpeakerName":"Soohyeon","SpeakerAssetName":"CharacterName/t0182","IconName":"t0182s5_surprise","IconLocate":2,"Text":"Mom, what are you talking about!?","sfxName":"","sfxVolume":1.0},{"ID":"main_314_001_dialog_english##_17_001","SpeakerName":"Yonghyeon","SpeakerAssetName":"CharacterName/t0184","IconName":"t0184s4_surprise","IconLocate":2,"Text":"A-Are you... exiling us!?","sfxName":"","sfxVolume":1.0},{"ID":"main_314_001_dialog_english##_17_002","SpeakerName":"Maeok","SpeakerAssetName":"CharacterName/t3407c4","IconName":"t3407c4_serious","IconLocate":2,"Text":"Listen, starting tomorrow I won't be the arbiter anymore, and then I won't be able to protect you.","sfxName":"","sfxVolume":1.0},{"ID":"main_314_001_dialog_english##_17_003","SpeakerName":"Maeok","SpeakerAssetName":"CharacterName/t3407c4","IconName":"t3407c4_serious","IconLocate":2,"Text":"Now, make haste. I've paid the guards to look the other way.","sfxName":"","sfxVolume":1.0},{"ID":"main_314_001_dialog_english##_17_004","SpeakerName":"???","SpeakerAssetName":"CharacterName/h0179","IconName":"h0179s5_serious","IconLocate":2,"Text":"Is that so?","sfxName":"","sfxVolume":1.0},{"ID":"main_314_001_dialog_english##_18_000","SpeakerName":"Maeok","SpeakerAssetName":"CharacterName/t3407c4","IconName":"t3407c4_surprise","IconLocate":2,"Text":"Ace!? What are you doing here?","sfxName":"","sfxVolume":1.0},{"ID":"main_314_001_dialog_english##_18_001","SpeakerName":"Ace","SpeakerAssetName":"CharacterName/h0179","IconName":"h0179s5_serious","IconLocate":2,"Text":"Doing my job.","sfxName":"","sfxVolume":1.0},{"ID":"main_314_001_dialog_english##_18_002","SpeakerName":"Yonghyeon","SpeakerAssetName":"CharacterName/t0184","IconName":"t0184s4_anger","IconLocate":2,"Text":"Get out of here, human! You aren't welcome here!","sfxName":"","sfxVolume":1.0},{"ID":"main_314_001_dialog_english##_19_000","SpeakerName":"Ace","SpeakerAssetName":"CharacterName/h0179","IconName":"h0179s5_sp1","IconLocate":2,"Text":"Get out of my way, kid.","sfxName":"","sfxVolume":1.0},{"ID":"main_314_001_dialog_english##_19_001","SpeakerName":"Yonghyeon","SpeakerAssetName":"CharacterName/t0184","IconName":"t0184s4_anger","IconLocate":2,"Text":"You get out of the way!!","sfxName":"","sfxVolume":1.0},{"ID":"main_314_001_dialog_english##_20_000","SpeakerName":"Maeok","SpeakerAssetName":"CharacterName/t3407c4","IconName":"t3407c4_serious","IconLocate":2,"Text":"Stop, Yonghyeon! He's here for me.","sfxName":"","sfxVolume":1.0},{"ID":"main_314_001_dialog_english##_20_001","SpeakerName":"Yonghyeon","SpeakerAssetName":"CharacterName/t0184","IconName":"t0184s4_surprise","IconLocate":2,"Text":"Arbiter Maeok?","sfxName":"","sfxVolume":1.0},{"ID":"main_314_001_dialog_english##_20_002","SpeakerName":"Ace","SpeakerAssetName":"CharacterName/h0179","IconName":"h0179s5_serious","IconLocate":2,"Text":"Seems like you've been privy to my arrival. Send any more exploding letters, lately?","sfxName":"","sfxVolume":1.0},{"ID":"main_314_001_dialog_english##_21_000","SpeakerName":"Soohyeon","SpeakerAssetName":"CharacterName/t0182","IconName":"t0182s5_surprise","IconLocate":2,"Text":"Exploding letters? W-What!? My mom didn't have anything to do with that!","sfxName":"","sfxVolume":1.0},{"ID":"main_314_001_dialog_english##_21_001","SpeakerName":"Ace","SpeakerAssetName":"CharacterName/h0179","IconName":"h0179s5_serious","IconLocate":2,"Text":"I didn't believe it at first, either. Why would the arbiter do such a thing?","sfxName":"","sfxVolume":1.0},{"ID":"main_314_001_dialog_english##_22_000","SpeakerName":"Ace","SpeakerAssetName":"CharacterName/h0179","IconName":"h0179s5_serious","IconLocate":2,"Text":"But then I found records written by a certain artisan.","sfxName":"","sfxVolume":1.0},{"ID":"main_314_001_dialog_english##_22_001","SpeakerName":"Ace","SpeakerAssetName":"CharacterName/h0179","IconName":"h0179s5_serious","IconLocate":2,"Text":"He's long gone by now, but we've still been able to dig up that he and the arbiter had some sort of relationship.","sfxName":"","sfxVolume":1.0},{"ID":"main_314_001_dialog_english##_22_002","SpeakerName":"Ace","SpeakerAssetName":"CharacterName/h0179","IconName":"h0179s5_serious","IconLocate":2,"Text":"That's why he agreed to custom make those fireworks for you, as well as...","sfxName":"","sfxVolume":1.0},{"ID":"main_314_001_dialog_english##_23_000","SpeakerName":"Ace","SpeakerAssetName":"CharacterName/h0179","IconName":"h0179s5_serious","IconLocate":2,"Text":"Exploding letters for the Desert Kingdom and my own! Says it all right here in his records!","sfxName":"","sfxVolume":1.0},{"ID":"main_314_001_dialog_english##_24_000","SpeakerName":"Maeok","SpeakerAssetName":"CharacterName/t3407c4","IconName":"t3407c4_embarrass","IconLocate":2,"Text":"...So, I've been found out...","sfxName":"","sfxVolume":1.0},{"ID":"main_314_001_dialog_english##_24_001","SpeakerName":"Soohyeon","SpeakerAssetName":"CharacterName/t0182","IconName":"t0182s5_surprise","IconLocate":2,"Text":"Mom!? But... why!?","sfxName":"","sfxVolume":1.0},{"ID":"main_314_001_dialog_english##_24_002","SpeakerName":"Maeok","SpeakerAssetName":"CharacterName/t3407c4","IconName":"t3407c4_sorrow","IconLocate":2,"Text":"...It was all to keep you from ever joining that damned tournament.","sfxName":"","sfxVolume":1.0},{"ID":"main_314_001_dialog_english##_24_003","SpeakerName":"Soohyeon","SpeakerAssetName":"CharacterName/t0182","IconName":"t0182s5_surprise","IconLocate":2,"Text":"Me!?","sfxName":"","sfxVolume":1.0},{"ID":"main_314_001_dialog_english##_24_004","SpeakerName":"Maeok","SpeakerAssetName":"CharacterName/t3407c4","IconName":"t3407c4_embarrass","IconLocate":2,"Text":"Soohyeon... I've known about you being a bewitcher for a long time now.","sfxName":"","sfxVolume":1.0},{"ID":"main_314_001_dialog_english##_25_000","SpeakerName":"Maeok","SpeakerAssetName":"CharacterName/t3407c4","IconName":"t3407c4_sorrow","IconLocate":2,"Text":"How could I not know? I'm your mother.","sfxName":"","sfxVolume":1.0},{"ID":"main_314_001_dialog_english##_25_001","SpeakerName":"Soohyeon","SpeakerAssetName":"CharacterName/t0182","IconName":"t0182s5_sp1","IconLocate":2,"Text":"...B-But, why didn't you tell me? Didn't it scare you... having a daughter like me...","sfxName":"","sfxVolume":1.0},{"ID":"main_314_001_dialog_english##_26_000","SpeakerName":"Maeok","SpeakerAssetName":"CharacterName/t3407c4","IconName":"t3407c4_embarrass","IconLocate":2,"Text":"Don't be silly, Soohyeon. A mother is never scared of her own daughter.","sfxName":"","sfxVolume":1.0},{"ID":"main_314_001_dialog_english##_26_001","SpeakerName":"Maeok","SpeakerAssetName":"CharacterName/t3407c4","IconName":"t3407c4_sorrow","IconLocate":2,"Text":"I couldn't tell you I knew, it would be too dangerous. I'm the arbiter, after all.","sfxName":"","sfxVolume":1.0},{"ID":"main_314_001_dialog_english##_26_002","SpeakerName":"Soohyeon","SpeakerAssetName":"CharacterName/t0182","IconName":"t0182s5_sorrow","IconLocate":2,"Text":"Mom...","sfxName":"","sfxVolume":1.0},{"ID":"main_314_001_dialog_english##_26_003","SpeakerName":"Maeok","SpeakerAssetName":"CharacterName/t3407c4","IconName":"t3407c4_nervous","IconLocate":2,"Text":"I couldn't say anything out loud, and I couldn't watch you join the tournament... it would be much too dangerous.","sfxName":"","sfxVolume":1.0},{"ID":"main_314_001_dialog_english##_26_004","SpeakerName":"Maeok","SpeakerAssetName":"CharacterName/t3407c4","IconName":"t3407c4_sorrow","IconLocate":2,"Text":"So, I had to find some reason to stop the tournament, or stop you from joining.","sfxName":"","sfxVolume":1.0},{"ID":"main_314_001_dialog_english##_26_005","SpeakerName":"Ace","SpeakerAssetName":"CharacterName/h0179","IconName":"h0179s5_sp1","IconLocate":2,"Text":"And so you chose to endanger the lives of royalty?","sfxName":"","sfxVolume":1.0},{"ID":"main_314_001_dialog_english##_27_000","SpeakerName":"Maeok","SpeakerAssetName":"CharacterName/t3407c4","IconName":"t3407c4_embarrass","IconLocate":2,"Text":"It may seem extreme, but it was the only way I could think to get you two involved.","sfxName":"","sfxVolume":1.0},{"ID":"main_314_001_dialog_english##_27_001","SpeakerName":"Ace","SpeakerAssetName":"CharacterName/h0179","IconName":"h0179s5_sp1","IconLocate":2,"Text":"You used us, plain and simple, as a way to make decisions you wouldn't normally be able to make.","sfxName":"","sfxVolume":1.0},{"ID":"main_314_001_dialog_english##_28_000","SpeakerName":"Soohyeon","SpeakerAssetName":"CharacterName/t0182","IconName":"t0182s5_sp1","IconLocate":2,"Text":"...So, you planned all of this all along, Mom?","sfxName":"","sfxVolume":1.0},{"ID":"main_314_001_dialog_english##_28_001","SpeakerName":"Maeok","SpeakerAssetName":"CharacterName/t3407c4","IconName":"t3407c4_sorrow","IconLocate":2,"Text":"Well, I never could have planned for the Udumbara flowering, or for you to reveal your identity to help Pearl Manor.","sfxName":"","sfxVolume":1.0},{"ID":"main_314_001_dialog_english##_29_000","SpeakerName":"Soohyeon","SpeakerAssetName":"CharacterName/t0182","IconName":"t0182s5_sorrow","IconLocate":2,"Text":"Mom... you did all of this for me...","sfxName":"","sfxVolume":1.0},{"ID":"main_314_001_dialog_english##_29_001","SpeakerName":"Soohyeon","SpeakerAssetName":"CharacterName/t0182","IconName":"t0182s5_sp4","IconLocate":2,"Text":"I've been worrying about you all this time... and I've even been angry with you...","sfxName":"","sfxVolume":1.0},{"ID":"main_314_001_dialog_english##_30_000","SpeakerName":"Maeok","SpeakerAssetName":"CharacterName/t3407c4","IconName":"t3407c4_sp1","IconLocate":2,"Text":"Don't cry, my child. You were just trying to help me in your own way, and all those people in need.","sfxName":"","sfxVolume":1.0},{"ID":"main_314_001_dialog_english##_30_001","SpeakerName":"Maeok","SpeakerAssetName":"CharacterName/t3407c4","IconName":"t3407c4_sorrow","IconLocate":2,"Text":"You had... no choice.","sfxName":"","sfxVolume":1.0},{"ID":"main_314_001_dialog_english##_30_002","SpeakerName":"Soohyeon","SpeakerAssetName":"CharacterName/t0182","IconName":"t0182s5_sp4","IconLocate":2,"Text":"Mom... I'm sorry!","sfxName":"","sfxVolume":1.0},{"ID":"main_314_001_dialog_english##_31_000","SpeakerName":"Yonghyeon","SpeakerAssetName":"CharacterName/t0184","IconName":"t0184s4_embarrass","IconLocate":2,"Text":"(...The arbiter's done so much for Soohyeon, and here I am acting like a fool...)","sfxName":"","sfxVolume":1.0},{"ID":"main_314_001_dialog_english##_32_000","SpeakerName":"Ace","SpeakerAssetName":"CharacterName/h0179","IconName":"h0179s5_serious","IconLocate":2,"Text":"I understand you were just acting on behalf of your child, Arbiter Maeok, and yet your actions have their consequences.","sfxName":"","sfxVolume":1.0},{"ID":"main_314_001_dialog_english##_33_000","SpeakerName":"Maeok","SpeakerAssetName":"CharacterName/t3407c4","IconName":"t3407c4_embarrass","IconLocate":2,"Text":"I know you have to do your job as an ambassador to your kingdom, and yet...","sfxName":"","sfxVolume":1.0},{"ID":"main_314_001_dialog_english##_33_001","SpeakerName":"Maeok","SpeakerAssetName":"CharacterName/t3407c4","IconName":"t3407c4_serious","IconLocate":2,"Text":"If your sister were in danger, I assume her safety would take precedence, would it not?","sfxName":"","sfxVolume":1.0},{"ID":"main_314_001_dialog_english##_34_000","SpeakerName":"Ace","SpeakerAssetName":"CharacterName/h0179","IconName":"h0179s5_sp1","IconLocate":2,"Text":"You better explain yourself right now.","sfxName":"","sfxVolume":1.0},{"ID":"main_314_001_dialog_english##_34_001","SpeakerName":"Maeok","SpeakerAssetName":"CharacterName/t3407c4","IconName":"t3407c4_serious","IconLocate":2,"Text":"According to my intel, someone named Sione has been trapped by my army in Pearl Manor. I'm not sure how long she'll be able to last...","sfxName":"","sfxVolume":1.0},{"ID":"main_314_001_dialog_english##_34_002","SpeakerName":"Ace","SpeakerAssetName":"CharacterName/h0179","IconName":"h0179s5_anger","IconLocate":2,"Text":"Dammit...!!!","sfxName":"","sfxVolume":1.0},{"ID":"main_314_001_dialog_english##_35_000","SpeakerName":"Ace","SpeakerAssetName":"CharacterName/h0179","IconName":"h0179s5_anger","IconLocate":2,"Text":"You better pray my sister isn't hurt!","sfxName":"","sfxVolume":1.0},{"ID":"main_314_001_dialog_english##_36_000","SpeakerName":"Ace","SpeakerAssetName":"CharacterName/h0179","IconName":"h0179s5_serious","IconLocate":2,"Text":"Everyone, come with me. We're going to Pearl Manor!","sfxName":"","sfxVolume":1.0},{"ID":"main_314_001_dialog_english##_37_000","SpeakerName":"Maeok","SpeakerAssetName":"CharacterName/t3407c4","IconName":"t3407c4_nervous","IconLocate":2,"Text":"They're finally gone. Quick, you two, leave while you still can!","sfxName":"","sfxVolume":1.0},{"ID":"main_314_001_dialog_english##_37_001","SpeakerName":"Soohyeon","SpeakerAssetName":"CharacterName/t0182","IconName":"t0182s5_embarrass","IconLocate":2,"Text":"But mom, what about you?","sfxName":"","sfxVolume":1.0},{"ID":"main_314_001_dialog_english##_38_000","SpeakerName":"Maeok","SpeakerAssetName":"CharacterName/t3407c4","IconName":"t3407c4_serious","IconLocate":2,"Text":"I must attend the ceremony and keep up appearances. That will give you ample time to escape.","sfxName":"","sfxVolume":1.0},{"ID":"main_314_001_dialog_english##_38_001","SpeakerName":"Soohyeon","SpeakerAssetName":"CharacterName/t0182","IconName":"t0182s5_serious","IconLocate":2,"Text":"No! I'm not leaving without you!","sfxName":"","sfxVolume":1.0},{"ID":"main_314_001_dialog_english##_38_002","SpeakerName":"Maeok","SpeakerAssetName":"CharacterName/t3407c4","IconName":"t3407c4_sorrow","IconLocate":2,"Text":"Soohyeon... What's most important right now is that you're safe.","sfxName":"","sfxVolume":1.0},{"ID":"main_314_001_dialog_english##_38_003","SpeakerName":"Soohyeon","SpeakerAssetName":"CharacterName/t0182","IconName":"t0182s5_sorrow","IconLocate":2,"Text":"But, mom...","sfxName":"","sfxVolume":1.0},{"ID":"main_314_001_dialog_english##_38_004","SpeakerName":"Maeok","SpeakerAssetName":"CharacterName/t3407c4","IconName":"t3407c4_sp1","IconLocate":2,"Text":"Please, just do this for me. I promise I'll come find you after all of this is over.","sfxName":"","sfxVolume":1.0},{"ID":"main_314_001_dialog_english##_39_000","SpeakerName":"Soohyeon","SpeakerAssetName":"CharacterName/t0182","IconName":"t0182s5_sp1","IconLocate":2,"Text":"...O-Okay, mom... I understand...","sfxName":"","sfxVolume":1.0},{"ID":"main_314_001_dialog_english##_40_000","SpeakerName":"Maeok","SpeakerAssetName":"CharacterName/t3407c4","IconName":"t3407c4_serious","IconLocate":2,"Text":"Yonghyeon...","sfxName":"","sfxVolume":1.0},{"ID":"main_314_001_dialog_english##_40_001","SpeakerName":"Yonghyeon","SpeakerAssetName":"CharacterName/t0184","IconName":"t0184s4_serious","IconLocate":2,"Text":"I won't let any harm come to Soohyeon!","sfxName":"","sfxVolume":1.0},{"ID":"main_314_001_dialog_english##_40_002","SpeakerName":"Maeok","SpeakerAssetName":"CharacterName/t3407c4","IconName":"t3407c4_sp1","IconLocate":2,"Text":"Good. Now go.","sfxName":"","sfxVolume":1.0},{"ID":"main_314_001_dialog_english##_41_000","SpeakerName":"Soohyeon","SpeakerAssetName":"CharacterName/t0182","IconName":"t0182s5_serious","IconLocate":2,"Text":"You better keep your promise, mom! You better come see me soon!","sfxName":"","sfxVolume":1.0},{"ID":"main_314_001_dialog_english##_41_001","SpeakerName":"Maeok","SpeakerAssetName":"CharacterName/t3407c4","IconName":"t3407c4_sp1","IconLocate":2,"Text":"Silly girl... when have I ever broken a promise to you?","sfxName":"","sfxVolume":1.0}]}
